about_the_game:
Travel around town completing mini-games to help the villagers get ready for the fall festival in the evening.

Features:

  • Explore the town at your own pace. The game will save automatically with most actions so there's no fear of losing your progress; and there's no wrong actions that would require backtracking on your progress.

  • Upon completing tasks for the villagers you'll receive fun pieces of clothing to wear as you continue to prepare for the evening's festival.

  • Some objectives are solved by completing mini-games, others are solved by fetching some items, and still others require your own personal spin on what looks best.

  • Fishing and Farming exist but not in a way that consume the majority of time in the game. They're more like temporary objectives than the main focus of the game; however, if you want to spend more time on them then that's completely up to you.

If you know what a Froken is please don't mention it to the person behind them before release. This is meant to be a surprise gift for them. Thank-you :)

Features:

  • Some objectives are solved by completing mini-games, others are solved by fetching some items, and still others require your own personal spin on what looks best.

  • Fishing and Farming exist but not in a way that consume the majority of time in the game. They're more like temporary objectives than the main focus of the game; however, if you want to spend more time on them then that's completely up to you.

If you know what a Froken is please don't mention it to the person behind them before release. This is meant to be a surprise gift for them. Thank-you :)
name: Foxes' Festival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-760 (4*2800), AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: It's festival day! and there's lots to do around the town to get ready. Help the villagers out around town to get ready for the festival by doing various tasks including fishing, farming, and painting. Maybe you'll earn some cool shirts, hats, and glasses along the way!
